full_text: I extend my deepest condolences to the victims and all those affected by the horrific attack at Bondi Beach. Taiwan strongly condemns all acts of terrorism and stands with the people of Australia & the Jewish community during this difficult time.

Recent Chinese military provocations near Japan & across the region have escalated tensions & highlight the urgency of increased investments in defense. We stand together with democratic partners in opposing these actions & remain resolute in our determination to safeguard peace.

#Taiwan’s transition from authoritarianism to democracy taught us that freedom comes at a cost. On #HumanRightsDay, let's take time to reflect on history’s lessons, commemorate our hard-won progress, and together shine a light of hope for those striving for freedom. https://t.co/FMojTm1hB2

Greatly appreciate that the #US National Security Strategy prioritizes deterring a conflict over Taiwan & highlights the security of the First Island Chain. #Taiwan will continue to be a reliable partner deeply committed to strengthening our self-defense to uphold regional peace.

Enjoyed a warm meal & holiday cheer with #AIT Director Raymond Greene & our American friends. Great food & conversation, and many toasts to everything ahead for #Taiwan & the #US. Here’s to friendship, cooperation, and a stronger, more prosperous world. https://t.co/A6ODdCm0nk

Glad to meet with many great friends of #Taiwan from @NATLCOMMITTEE. While we advance defense reforms & societal resilience at home, we also look forward to building on our partnerships with the #US & other freedom-loving nations to uphold our shared values & interests. https://t.co/P2azLXGLDO

Happy to address fellow nephrologists at the Asian Pacific Congress of Nephrology today in #Taiwan. From treatment to prevention, integrated care to early screening, Taiwan is advancing in the fight against kidney disease & will keep sharing its experience for global health. https://t.co/5dqxKU5Cb2

Addressing its Open Expert Meeting, I thanked the @medwma for its longstanding support & highlighted some of #Taiwan’s many healthcare efforts. With initiatives like our AI-driven smart health system & enhanced governance, we're committed to advancing local & global well-being. https://t.co/jcyitoC1rG

Greatly appreciate President @realDonaldTrump’s signing of the Taiwan Assurance Implementation Act, underlining the importance of #US engagement with #Taiwan. Going forward, we’ll work even more closely with the US in all sectors to ensure regional peace, stability & prosperity.

Warm congratulations to Prime Minister Philip J. Pierre on his re-election. Over the years, #Taiwan & #StLucia have achieved steady progress in agriculture, economic empowerment, & more. We remain committed to deepening these efforts to advance the wellbeing of both our peoples.

My sincere congratulations to Dr. Godwin Friday as he assumes office as prime minister of St. Vincent & the Grenadines. #Taiwan & #SVG share a long & close friendship, and we look forward to deepening cooperation across key sectors to further advance development & prosperity.

#Taiwan-made & Taiwan-proud, Formosat-8 is now in orbit! We’re geared up to launch the other 7 units to complete this constellation, enhancing our disaster readiness, environmental protection & national resilience—Yet another leap forward for Taiwan's fast-growing space industry.

As #Taiwan has become a super-aged society, we’re advancing reforms to meet changing healthcare needs. Today’s Healthy Taiwan Promotion committee agenda focused on expanding accessible, community-based services for healthy ageing and upgrading our long-term care programs. https://t.co/cZjEpmsEmY

香港新界大埔昨晚發生重大火災，蔓延多棟住宅高樓。目前已有逾百人傷亡、仍有多人失蹤。所幸消防人員努力搶救，火勢已受到控制。

此時此刻，讓我們一起為香港祈福。我要為所有在災害中逝去的香港朋友、及其家屬致上最深的哀悼之意，並誠摯的慰問傷者，也希望能早日平安尋獲失蹤者。

No country is more determined in safeguarding #Taiwan’s future than our own. My @washingtonpost op-ed outlines how our unprecedented defense budget & military investments will build a stronger Taiwan as we, alongside the #US, pursue peace through strength.
https://t.co/CvgUoeKEDI

Glad to welcome Speaker Jabulani Mabuza & House of Assembly members and thank them for the solid support. #Taiwan deeply values #Eswatini's support as we continue to make great strides in energy, health, agriculture & education, with much potential to build even more prosperity. https://t.co/peyJUyjRRe

Proud to witness the launch of @Google's AI Infrastructure Engineering Center today. The opening of this new R&D center in #Taiwan highlights our growing role in global AI development, and we will keep leveraging our strengths to help build secure & trustworthy AI. https://t.co/NlzOW62dD5

Talofa! Greetings to PM Feleti Teo on his 1st state visit & 3rd time in Taiwan. Proud to witness signings of the #Taiwan-#Tuvalu Kaitasi Treaty & cooperation agreements on fisheries & sports, paving the way for a solid future partnership marked by prosperity & development. https://t.co/rMw9GjwoFQ

Glad to welcome #StKittsAndNevis PM @TerranceDrewSKN back to #Taiwan so we can personally witness our partnership deepen with new sister-city agreements and progress in medicine & health, energy & more. Let’s keep moving forward on the path to a sustainable & prosperous future. https://t.co/3j6zh3nnYY

Deeply appreciate the @G7 FMs for voicing opposition to any unilateral attempts to change the status quo in the Taiwan Strait, particularly by force or coercion. As committed as ever to a free & open Indo-Pacific, #Taiwan will keep contributing to lasting peace & stability.
